attributes.action:
A Day of Leave Remembering All Sacrifices
Giving Life Minds Body For Democracy
attributes.additional_details:
The UK stands up for freedom, for democracy.
Ensuring we have free speach. That being different isn't wrong, that everyone is important and is valued. 
A day of leave to remember, to honour, to learn, understand and say Thank You to all the people from our and other countries who stood & fell together 100 YEARS after the end of the GREAT WAR and 80 YEARS after the Second World War would be fitting. 
Many countries from EU and around the world have a day to remember.
Not Just On 11th November
attributes.background:
Give the People Of the United Kingdom A Day Of Leave To Honour All That Have & Are Making Sacrifices For Democracy. 
To Ensure That Every Generation Remembers & Understand How & Why Persecution, Oppression, Hatred & Fear Can Take Hold.
Freedom Isn't Always A Right. 
LEST WE FORGET
